channel.title: Himat版 Steam 新規ストア公開（画像＋説明）
channel.description: Games whose Steam store page just went public (detected)

item.title: Push Defense
item.description: Push Defense is a push puzzle game with tower defense aspects encompassing five different game modes. Solve challenging puzzles while utilizing the tools provided in each game mode to survive.
item.content:encoded:
Push Defense is a push puzzle game with tower defense aspects encompassing five different game modes. Solve challenging puzzles while utilizing the tools provided in each game mode to survive.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Galactic Nine Lives
item.description: Galactic Nine Lives is a pixel-perfect roguelike bullet hell where a cat-headed warrior battles relentless waves of enemies. Dodge, shoot, and unlock powerful skills in this fast-paced minimalist arcade experience!
item.content:encoded:
Galactic Nine Lives is a pixel-perfect roguelike bullet hell where a cat-headed warrior battles relentless waves of enemies. Dodge, shoot, and unlock powerful skills in this fast-paced minimalist arcade experience!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Turning The Tide
item.description: Welcome to January 1941. Allied forces have just repelled an invasion force in the Battle of Britain but their forces are severely depleted. Plans have been made to halt the Nazi war machine and Turn The Tide towards an all out victory. YOU have been hand-picked to carry out those plans. God Speed.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to January 1941. Allied forces have just repelled an invasion force in the Battle of Britain but their forces are severely depleted. Plans have been made to halt the Nazi war machine and Turn The Tide towards an all out victory. YOU have been hand-picked to carry out those plans. God Speed.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Study Time Anomaly
item.description: You fell asleep studying for exams… when you woke up the school was empty. Survive the night, identify what’s wrong, and escape the loop or be stuck at school forever.
item.content:encoded:
You fell asleep studying for exams… when you woke up the school was empty. Survive the night, identify what’s wrong, and escape the loop or be stuck at school forever.

item.title: Retro Racing 2 Demo
item.description: From the developer of Amiga classics Nitro and A.T.R. Retro Racing 2 is a frenetic top-down arcade racer with power-ups and wild tracks. Pure retro-speed! Race solo or in split-screen multiplayer, and relive classic retro racing with a modern twist!
item.content:encoded:
From the developer of Amiga classics Nitro and A.T.R. Retro Racing 2 is a frenetic top-down arcade racer with power-ups and wild tracks. Pure retro-speed! Race solo or in split-screen multiplayer, and relive classic retro racing with a modern twist!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Quntique Dynasty:Town Defense
item.description: Quntique Dynasty is a strategy game that blends Tower Defense and Hack and Slash genres with Rogue Lite mechanics. Dominate the map by strengthening your equipment, but remember there is no shield stronger than the city walls. If you are looking for challenging discoveries, the dungeons await you.
item.content:encoded:
Quntique Dynasty is a strategy game that blends Tower Defense and Hack and Slash genres with Rogue Lite mechanics. Dominate the map by strengthening your equipment, but remember there is no shield stronger than the city walls. If you are looking for challenging discoveries, the dungeons await you.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Principal Panic
item.description: Principal Panic is a multiplayer school party game filled with chaotic humor. Each round, one player becomes the principal, while the others try to create chaos by completing mischievous tasks, dancing, and managing energy. Distinguish real students from bots and survive.
item.content:encoded:
Principal Panic is a multiplayer school party game filled with chaotic humor. Each round, one player becomes the principal, while the others try to create chaos by completing mischievous tasks, dancing, and managing energy. Distinguish real students from bots and survive.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Balcony Garden
item.description: A cozy VR gardening game where you grow 80+ rare plants from all seven continents. Water, fertilize, and care for your garden. Enjoy dynamic weather, calm vibes, and surprise visits from cute animals — all without quests or complex systems
item.content:encoded:
A cozy VR gardening game where you grow 80+ rare plants from all seven continents. Water, fertilize, and care for your garden. Enjoy dynamic weather, calm vibes, and surprise visits from cute animals — all without quests or complex systems

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Dungeon Shifters Demo
item.description: Dungeon Shifters is an action RPG set in a world broken by a magic comet. Explore ancient dungeons, uncover lost secrets, and battle deadly ememies in third-person combat. Choose your adventurer and shape your fate in the depths.
item.content:encoded:
Dungeon Shifters is an action RPG set in a world broken by a magic comet. Explore ancient dungeons, uncover lost secrets, and battle deadly ememies in third-person combat. Choose your adventurer and shape your fate in the depths.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Neuter Master
item.description: A lighthearted roguelike breeding game where you match animals on a customizable grid, earn gold with slot-machine-style combos, and balance breeding, sterilizing, and upgrades to keep your herd thriving year after year.
item.content:encoded:
A lighthearted roguelike breeding game where you match animals on a customizable grid, earn gold with slot-machine-style combos, and balance breeding, sterilizing, and upgrades to keep your herd thriving year after year.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Fractured Dream
item.description: Uncover your true identity on an alien planet. Run, climb, sneak, hide, and fight to keep yourself alive as you explore the vast world before you; just stay on your toes, you never know what is waiting in the water, trees, ice, or dunes.
item.content:encoded:
Uncover your true identity on an alien planet. Run, climb, sneak, hide, and fight to keep yourself alive as you explore the vast world before you; just stay on your toes, you never know what is waiting in the water, trees, ice, or dunes.

item.title: Ikigai: An Alternate Cold War Simulator
item.description: In a world where the east and the west have their histories switched, take control of the United Provinces of Kinshu, the foremost power during the most volatile era of its history, the cold war. In the midst of global conflicts, corruption, and conspiracy, your decisions shall mark your destiny.
item.content:encoded:
In a world where the east and the west have their histories switched, take control of the United Provinces of Kinshu, the foremost power during the most volatile era of its history, the cold war. In the midst of global conflicts, corruption, and conspiracy, your decisions shall mark your destiny.

item.title: The Scouring - Gold Dev Supporter Pack
item.description: Dive into The Scouring's fantasy world with this Digital Artbook+Devlog DLC. Discover never-before-seen concept art, developer commentary, and the evolution of the game's brutal strategy aesthetic. A must-have for true The Scoouring!
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Detective VR
item.description: Step into a thrilling narrative investigation in Virtual Reality! In DETECTIVE VR, you control time, collect crucial clues, and interview witnesses to unravel the plot.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Focus Group - First Day
item.description: FOCUS GROUP First Day is the free prologue of FOCUS GROUP, a co-op-only puzzle thriller where two players take part in a mysterious corporate stress test. Use communication and logic to solve asymmetrical puzzles. One sees a lever. The other reads the manual. Neither of you know what it does.
item.content:encoded:
FOCUS GROUP First Day is the free prologue of FOCUS GROUP, a co-op-only puzzle thriller where two players take part in a mysterious corporate stress test. Use communication and logic to solve asymmetrical puzzles. One sees a lever. The other reads the manual. Neither of you know what it does.

item.title: One More Mix
item.description: The ultimate(?) radio show "One More Mix" has just begun! But wait—our host has zero DJ experience… is this really okay?! ∑(O_O；) Scratch with your mouse to connect beats, and join the self-proclaimed rich BAKA girl & a chill, downer gal as you witness the fate of One More Mix!
item.content:encoded:
The ultimate(?) radio show "One More Mix" has just begun! But wait—our host has zero DJ experience… is this really okay?! ∑(O_O；) Scratch with your mouse to connect beats, and join the self-proclaimed rich BAKA girl & a chill, downer gal as you witness the fate of One More Mix!

item.title: 거울 너머
item.description: Developed by ‘Checkmate’, a senior student team from Hoseo University, “Beyond the Mirror” is a 2D horror adventure where players manage stress and switch characters using the Baton Touch System to escape a mysterious mirror world and uncover the truth behind a chilling school ghost story.
item.content:encoded:
Developed by ‘Checkmate’, a senior student team from Hoseo University, “Beyond the Mirror” is a 2D horror adventure where players manage stress and switch characters using the Baton Touch System to escape a mysterious mirror world and uncover the truth behind a chilling school ghost story.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Asterfel
item.description: Asterfel is a third-person Action-RPG. You find yourself shipwrecked on an island nation, where greed and magical mining rouse an old god from it’s slumber. Encounter three factions, discover forgotten history, and shape the island’s future. Will you thrive, survive, or witness the end of an era?
item.content:encoded:
Asterfel is a third-person Action-RPG. You find yourself shipwrecked on an island nation, where greed and magical mining rouse an old god from it’s slumber. Encounter three factions, discover forgotten history, and shape the island’s future. Will you thrive, survive, or witness the end of an era?

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Baiacool - Tides of Olympus
item.description: Dive deep into Greek mytholog (literally!) Face sea-god bosses as a dolphin with gear, solve puzzles, beat tough crusty foes, and find out that even underwater, the gods can’t stop stirring up drama.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Color a Cube - Ancient Rome Pack #1
item.description: Relive history with the Ancient Rome #1 Pack for Color A Cube! This timeless DLC features 10 iconic voxel models, from chariots and legionaries to aqueducts and amphitheatres. Bring the grandeur of the Roman Empire to life, one voxel at a time.
item.content:encoded:
Relive history with the Ancient Rome #1 Pack for Color A Cube! This timeless DLC features 10 iconic voxel models, from chariots and legionaries to aqueducts and amphitheatres. Bring the grandeur of the Roman Empire to life, one voxel at a time.

item.title: Isekai Training
item.description: Abandon your past life; this one hinges on training and survival. In a world of magic and monsters, spark fire, raise a timber keep—Observe, Prepare, Adapt, Restrain—carve through wilds, dungeons.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Yarn Guardians – Official Concept Art Book
item.description: Go behind the scenes of Yarn Guardians with this beautifully crafted digital art book. Dive into the creative journey—from sketch to in-game art—and discover how five courageous, flying cats came to life in a hand-drawn fantasy world.
item.content:encoded:
Go behind the scenes of Yarn Guardians with this beautifully crafted digital art book. Dive into the creative journey—from sketch to in-game art—and discover how five courageous, flying cats came to life in a hand-drawn fantasy world.

item.title: I'm Pregnant at 16: Episode 2
item.description: "I'm Pregnant at 16: Episode 2" is the continuation of a visual novel about difficult choices. New characters, more branching paths, emotions, and consequences. Help Lida navigate life, growing up, and pregnancy. Experience what it’s like to be pregnant at 16.
item.content:encoded:
"I'm Pregnant at 16: Episode 2" is the continuation of a visual novel about difficult choices. New characters, more branching paths, emotions, and consequences. Help Lida navigate life, growing up, and pregnancy. Experience what it’s like to be pregnant at 16.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Dota 2
item.description: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.
item.content:encoded:
Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

Steamでページを開く
